headline: NRG Price Target Raised to $167 as LS Power Acquisition Enhances Growth Profile
summary: BMO Capital analyst James Thalacker recently raised the price target on NRG Energy, Inc. (NYSE:NRG) to $167 from $115 and kept a Market Perform rating on the shares. NRG Energy, Inc. (NYSE:NRG) operates as an energy and home services company in the United States and Canada. In an investor note, the analyst underlined that the […]
